replies.body:
I don't see any lies there?

The forums still exist, and can be accessed. You just can't post on them.
They are now red only, and archived.

As the post says, we can still go there and relive the old days, but this is a new chapter.
I hope it will be a chapter of more positivity and more constructive and creative content.

Let us not forget where we came from, but let us remember to continually create a better environment for new players to join and feel comofrtable.
